response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I understand its worth to you is $12,000. Considering its true market value and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $13,500. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with our top-tier solution.", "product_price": 13500}
